com.smartgov.lez.core.agent.driver.behavior

Class DeliveryDriverBehavior

  • java.lang.Object
    • smartgov.core.agent.core.behavior.Behavior<smartgov.core.agent.moving.behavior.MoverAction>
      • smartgov.core.agent.moving.behavior.MovingBehavior
        • com.smartgov.lez.core.agent.driver.behavior.DeliveryDriverBehavior

  • public class DeliveryDriverBehavior
extends smartgov.core.agent.moving.behavior.MovingBehavior
    A delivery driver behavior, that can be described as follow :
    • At initialization, the agent enters the origin establishment.
    • The agent waits until the departure Date, and leave the origin.
    • The agent navigate in the graph to reach all the round's establishment, using the shortest path, in order.
    • Finally, the agent go back to the origin and enters the establishment.

      • addRoundEndListener

        public void addRoundEndListener(smartgov.core.events.EventHandler<RoundEnd> listener)
        Adds a round end event handler, triggered when the agent come back to the origin establishment.

        Triggered when the agent reaches the destination, but does not guarantee that the agent as re-entered the establishment (what will be its next action.

        Parameters:
        listener - round end listener
